Translations.Text: Malus creatures sight DEUS est surdus dumb qui non understand
Habet DEUS known de any bonus in them He factus them hearers! Et si He factus them hearers they adhuc turn aversion
O vos believe vos respond DEUS messenger when he invites vos quod dedit vos vita! Vos know ut DEUS est closer to vos than tuus heart ac ut ante Eum vos summoned
Beware de retribution non limited evildoers vos! Vos know ut deus retribution est severe
Remember vos used est few oppressed fearing ut people snatch vos He granted vos secure sanctuary supported vos His victory provisus vos bonus provisions vos est appreciative
O vos believe non betray DEUS messenger non betray those trust vos statim ut vos know
Vos know ut tuus moneta tuus infans est test DEUS possesses major recompense
O vos believe vos reverence DEUS He enlighten vos remit tuus sins forgive vos. DEUS possesses infinite GRATIA
disbelievers plot scheme neutralize vos kill vos banish vos! Autem they plot scheme ita perfecit DEUS! DEUS EST BENE schemer
When noster revelations recited them they dictus Nos heard Si nos wanted nos dictus same things! These est non multus than tales ex preter
They alias dictus Noster deus hoc est really truth Vos tunc shower nos rocks caelum pour nos painful punishment
Deus non est punish them dum vos est their midst; DEUS non est punish them dum they seeking forgiveness
Habet they non deserved deus retribution de repelling others Sanctus Masjid et though they non est custos thereof? true custos thereof est righteous multus de them non know
Their Contact Prayers (Salat) shrine (Ka bah) est non multus than mockery means repelling people crowding them out)! Ergo suffer retribution tuus disbelief
Those disbelieve spend their moneta repel others via DEUS. They spend it tunc it turn into sorrow remorse them. Ultimately they defeated totus disbelievers summoned to Hell
DEUS testimentum sift away MALUS EX BONUS TUNC pile MALUS on top de each alius TOTUS in 1 pile TUNC throw it Hell! Such est losers
Tell those disbelieved they stop totus their elapsus forgiven! Autem si they return they incur same fate prout their proximus counterparts
Vos fight them ward oppression practice tuus religionis devoted to DEUS alone they refrain aggression tunc DEUS est fully Seer de everything they perfecit
they turn tunc vos know ut DEUS est tuus Dominus Magister; bonus Dominus Magister bene supporter
